AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.label: glowing one
AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.description: A non feral glowing ghoul, is a decrepit, rotting, zombie-like mutant. Intense and prolonged radiation has ravaged their skin, much of their flesh and in some cases many of their ligaments. It emits a powerful glow capable of growing plants.
